official_title: To amend the South Pacific Tuna Act of 1988 to provide for duty-free treatment of canned tuna imported into the United States that was caught by certain vessels and processed in certain facilities.

summary.text: Amends the South Pacific Tuna Act of 1988 to grant duty-free treatment, provided certain eligibility requirements are met, to light meat tuna (prepared or preserved in airtight containers in any manner, except in oil) imported from any Pacific Island Party.

titles.title: To amend the South Pacific Tuna Act of 1988 to provide for duty-free treatment of canned tuna imported into the United States that was caught by certain vessels and processed in certain facilities.
